short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the time in 15 minutes from the user's current time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time in 15 Minutes is a simple and lightweight Chrome extension that allows you to quickly find out what time it will be 15 minutes from your current time.

Features:

Easy one-click access: Just click on the extension icon to see the time 15 minutes from now.
No additional setup required: The extension uses your computer's local time, so there's no need to configure any settings.
Privacy-friendly: We respect your privacy and do not collect any personal or sensitive user data.
